title: Cation–π-induced mixed-matrix nanocomposite for the detection and removal of Hg2+ and azinphos-methyl towards environment remediation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00114A, Paper
Kamalpreet Kaur, Gagandeep Singh, Navneet Kaur, Narinder Singh
Organic-cation modified MWCNTs-based nanocomposite derived membrane to reduce environmental pollution.
